articles.title: Griezmann: Messi said he was going to death with me, I feel it every day - The World Game
articles.description: Barcelona forward Antoine Griezmann insisted his relationship with Lionel Messi was good, saying he felt the star was ready to go to "death" with him.
articles.content:
Griezmann has struggled to make his mark at Barcelona since arriving from Atletico Madrid for 120 million last year.
